description:
Jougasaki Hikaru plays Sari Rayer (Priscillaria) on the "Cosprayers" show. She had grown up to be a tomboy after being raised around 6 older brothers.
Her name is derived from Jougasaki Chisato (城ヶ崎千里) of Denji Sentai Megaranger (電磁戦隊メガレンジャー) and Katsuragi Hikaru (桂木ひかる) of Choudenshi Bioman (超電子バイオマン).
name: Jougasaki Hikaru
